Southaven.BankPlus Amphitheater:
BankPlus Amphitheater at Snowden Grove, formerly Snowden Grove Amphitheater, is a concert venue located at Snowden Grove Park in Southaven, Mississippi, a suburb of Memphis, Tennessee. Opened in 2006, the amphitheater features 4,000 fixed seats, with a lawn area able to accommodate 7,000 additional spectators.


== Name change ==
In late 2014, BankPlus purchased the naming rights for Snowden Grove Amphitheater.
